== Main Inclusion Report for ca-certificates-java ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/c/ca-certificates-java]]</nowiki>; available for all architectures.
# ''Rationale:''
** Dependency of openjdk-6
 0. ''Security:''
** No security issues.
** Package just runs keytool to update a jks keystore.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Works out of the box without configuration.
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:ca-certificates-java|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: Two reports, which cannot be yet reproduced.
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/ca-certificates-java|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is calm.
** No upstream.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant.
** Packaging system: debhelper, no patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** openjdk-6, needs promotion together with openjdk-6.
